maxHours-options: Maximum hours old a recording should be. 0=archive no matter how old
recordingExtension-options: extension of dvr recordings ie: ts, mkv, etc.
archivePath-options: Path to your archive location. ie: d:\plex\tv\ or /mnt/plex/tv
pathToComskipNonWindows-options: Directory containing comskip.exe for non-Windows OS
tempPath-options: Temporary directory when archiving. Leave blank to use system temp directory
